name: Fierstjerren
description: The Fierstjerren is a medium undead creature characterized by its ominous appearance and a dark aura of malevolence.
memorable: Its ability to charm and control humanoid victims while becoming more dangerous when wounded makes it a formidable foe.
goals: To dominate and control living beings as thralls for its dark purposes.
relations: May serve in association with other undead or dark cults.
environment: Typically found in dark, sinister locations or amidst undead cults.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage and several conditions make it resilient in combat.
attacks: Makes two melee attacks with a sword, dealing consistent slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Apotheosis, which enhances its necrotic damage based on current hit points.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, allowing it to notice hidden threats effectively.
additional_information: Immunities to conditions like frightened and charmed enhance combat effectiveness.
Can have up to twelve thralls under its command.
Terrifying Glare can frighten opponents, disrupting their actions.
test_queries: creature that becomes stronger when injured
